questions.text:
A uniform magnetic field of 0.4 T acts perpendicular to a circular copper disc 20 cm in radius. The disc is having a uniform angular velocity of 10  rad s
–
1 about an axis through its centre and perpendicular to the disc. What is the protential difference developed between the axis of the disc and the rim ? ( = 3.14) (1) 0.0628 V (2
) 0.5024 V (3) 0.2512 V (4) 0.1256 V
